input.sentences: today i decided to display my art for my family . this art is called the ghost man .
this is the man in the wild .
my last art that i showed my family was something very simple . it was the tree that i grew up by near my grandmother house . it was something special about the tree .
output.sentences: The pictures in the house told a story of ghosts and terror.
The watchful eye always takes notice of your actions.
The wild fire bird circles you as you walk the halls.
The wild man sways with the wind from the open window.
once downstairs to safety, the lush greenery comforts your eyes.
